# Unit 1: Basic Basics {#sec-basics}

## Overview

Welcome to the first unit of [RYouWithMe](../)! In this first unit, you'll lay down the foundational knowledge and skills that will carry you through your R journey! Since it covers the basics of R in a hopefully straightforward way, we're calling it *Basic Basics*...

![basic basics banner](/courses/img/basicbasicsbanner.jpg)

## Lessons

This unit has three lessons:

1.  [An opinionated tour of RStudio](01-BasicBasics-1.qmd)
2.  [Installing and loading packages](01-BasicBasics-2.qmd)
3.  [Getting data into RStudio](01-BasicBasics-3.qmd)

Click on any of the links above (or use the navigation arrows below) to see the lessons. As you embark on Basic Basics, we think this is a useful reminder for R users new and experienced (h/t [realpython](twitter.com/realpython)):

![learning programming is like climbing a mountain](/courses/img/bblearning.jpg){width="300"}

Learning R is a journey - we're delighted to have you along!
